document_data.name: Tarina
document_data.mainbody: '''Tarina''' was the alias of a former pirate that sailed the seas of [[Faer√ªn]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], before "settling down" in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] on the [[Sword Coast]] as an agent of [[the Guild]].
document_data.History:
Tarina, or  '''Rhonda Thunderbell''' as she was then known, "earned" her wealth by stealing from her comrades, after months aboard the ''[[Uncivil Serpent]]'' under the captaincy of [[Murosko Sessprin]]. She ran off before they could catch her and get their revenge.

After slipping away into hiding in Baldur's Gate, she made friends with [[Nine-Fingers Keene]] of the Guild.

In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}{{BG-DiA-time}}, after over six months since her betrayal, she began to hear rumors that the crew of the ''Uncivil Serpent'' had finally pursued her to her new home.
